channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dog (human?) waste on the pavement, 10th February
item.description:
The poo has been on the pavement here for weeks now and just hasn't been cleared up. Suspiciously large for a dog...
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Doyce Street, The Borough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two large vehicles parked at the end of Somerset Avenue, 10th February
item.description:
Two large dark camper type vans are parked at the Sutherland even of Somerset Avenue. I believe a couple of living there. They seem to have been there foe months and they dont move.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Somerset Avenue, Blackfen, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Not enough lighting, 10th February
item.description:
Between the junction Pages Walk/ Willow Walk there isn't enough lighting in the road - each time I walk or cycle down this road I notice it's much darker than other surrounding roads - I don't know if it's that multiple street lamps are out, or maybe there just aren't any in some spots. Feels unsafe for walking alone sometimes.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Page's Walk, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large potholes in the road, 10th February
item.description:
